long_description: Intuitive and fun to ride, the MiiR Bambini Balance Bike will help your little one learn the fundamentals of bike riding and balance while building confidence. A parent-pleaser at its core, the bike features a fully adjustable stem and seatpost to keep pace with your growing kiddo. Rugged EVA foam tires eliminate the need for pumping. The MiiR Bambini Balance Bike is geared to kids ages 1.5 to 5 years old. What sets this bike apart? The purchase of this bike supports MiiR's effort to help a child in need in the U.S. earn a bike through a work- or study-to-own program.
short_description: Intuitive and fun to ride, the MiiR Bambini Balance Bike will help your little one learn the fundamentals of bike riding and balance while building confidence.
